title: Commemorating the 40th Anniversary of the Villa Roma Resort and Conference Center in Callicoon, New York
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  commemorating the 40th Anniversary of the Villa
Roma Resort and Conference Center in Callicoon, New York

WHEREAS, Organizations which serve the economic well-being and interests
of the people of this great Empire State merit the commendation of  this
Legislative Body; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly  proud  to  commem-
orate  the  40th  Anniversary  of  the  Villa Roma Resort and Conference
Center in Callicoon, New York; and
  WHEREAS, Over the course of 40 years of dedicated and inspired  owner-
ship  by  Marty Passante, the Villa Roma Resort and Conference Center in
Callicoon, New York, has become the  flagship  of  the  Sullivan  County
hospitality industry and one of the best resorts in the Catskills; and
  WHEREAS,  The Villa Roma Resort and Conference Center has grown from a
36-room family-run resort to one that can host more than 750  guests  on
its  450  rolling acres; it contains 68 full-ownership condominiums, 140
hotel rooms and 230 two-bedroom timeshare units; it also has an  18-hole
championship  golf course, a ski hill, bowling alley, indoor and outdoor
tennis courts and swimming pools, and multiple dining rooms, lounges,  a
recreation center and a nightclub; and
  WHEREAS,  The  Villa  Roma  Resort  and  Conference Center can host to
perfection weddings, organizational events, proms, family or class reun-
ions, anniversary parties, golf outings and a variety of  other  events;
and
  WHEREAS,  The  key  to the growth and success of the Villa Roma Resort
and Conference Center has been investing millions of dollars  back  into
improving and modernizing the facility and its amenities; and
  WHEREAS,  This  auspicious  occasion presents a unique opportunity for
this Legislative Body to recognize and pay tribute  to  the  Villa  Roma
Resort and Conference Center in Callicoon, New York; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is the sense of this Legislative Body that when business
organizations of such noble aims and accomplishments are brought to  our
attention,  they  should be recognized by all the citizens of this great
Empire State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
commemorate the 40th Anniversary of the Villa Roma Resort and Conference
Center in Callicoon, New York; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted  to  the Villa Roma Resort and Conference Center, 356 Villa Roma
Road, Callicoon, New York 12723.
